description: Learn everything you need to know about how to plan a trip to Cuba with coverage from the New York Times Travel section.
title: An (Evolving) Travel Guide to Cuba
title_page: An (Evolving) Travel Guide to Cuba - The New York Times
text:
Update
The United States government announced new rules that allow Americans to travel independently to Cuba on what are called “people-to-people” trips. This means that Americans who want to go to the island and spend their time meeting ordinary Cubans no longer have to book their trip through an organization.
